system.description:
A small gem of apparently inconsequential value which protects its possessor against poison.

  • Power: When found, roll [[/r 1d10]] on the table below to determine the magnitude of the periapt’s power.

  • Effect: The periapt protects its owner against poisons. The effect depends on the type of saving throw allowed by the poison:

    1. No save: The character has a percentage chance of resisting the poison.
    2. Save with penalty: The character rolls the save without the penalty.
    3. Normal save: The character gains a bonus to the saving throw.
